Text: The image will create a root account with password "mpiroot" and a user account named "mpi" with password "mpi". If the machine is exposed to the internet, please change the passwords.

Please note that a new and improved version has been uploaded, and that the new version supports the most recent PS3 firmware:
http://thepiratebay.org/tor/4130680/PS3_Boot_image_for_a_Gentoo_MPI_Cluster
